titleStmt.title: A true copy of two letters the first sent from the Earle of Ormond to the Honourable Colonell Michael Jones, commander in chiefe of the Parliament's forces in Leinster and governor of the city of Dublin : vvith Colonell Jones his answere to the Earle of Ormond's said letters.
titleStmt.author: Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.
Jones, Michael, d. 1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Dublin printed by William Bladen, 1649, and now reprinted,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of republication suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Contains two letters from Ormonde: "Carricke the 9. of March 1648" and "Thurles this 27th of March 1649", with two replies by Jones: "Dublin March 14, 1648 [1649] and "Dublin, March 31, 1649."
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
